name: Re-Pear (merizkadesigns)
description:
Re-Pear is a rhythm game where you play as Perry, the repair pear man fixing up Pearl's home! 

After a little too long away from home, Pearl's home is in complete disre-pear! Pearl enlists the help of handy-pear, Perry, to fix up and clean her hovel. "Pear"-up with Perry and groove to the beat to dust, wrench and hammer your way to victory! Prepare to Re-PEAR-ed! 

(Cheatcode: If you struggle with the bathtub, hold tab when pressing a key)

This game was created in 2-3 days during Global Game Jam 2020. The  theme was "Repair." This won best design. 

Developed with 7 other people. My role was the  ui artist, animator and character concept artist.
